creator: java@leeclemens.net

text:
Putting to one side that your test case contains a number of syntax errors that means it will never run, this works for me as expected once the errors have been fixed.

I can't immediately see how you could have broken this in your configuration but the users list is the place to figure out what is wrong.
creator: markt@apache.org
java@leeclemens.net
text: Seems the request in the JSP is com.documentum.web.env.IncludedHttpServletRequestWrapper
